content: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/types/primitive.yaml I was thinking of opening something to update the description around uint256 and wei around consensus being little endian vs big endian from execution client. does anyone have any opinion on this? it is just a given for most people looking at these apis?
